Text: ...I think it was around here.

(I've been told someone claiming to be an "executive
officer" is doing business here... It seems
suspicious, almost too blatant...)

(Still, there's a possibility the Cult is involved,
so I can't just ignore it.)
Ladies and Gentlemen! Come on over and take a look!
...And there she is.

Here we have a "plastic divider" that's all the rage
in a far-off country! Great for your lunchbox, or
even to use as jewelry!

You there, holding that bread! I have just the thing
for you! This here is called a "bread clip"―

...Is that the "executive officer"? She looks like
she's just selling junk...
Hey, can I talk to you for a second?
Yes, of course! What can I do for you―
My idol, you're here!!!
...Excuse me?

Huh...?! I-It's nothing! Please don't stare at me
like that...!

Hmm... I might as well hear what you have to say.
What's your name?

I-I can't believe I've been acknowledged by my idol!
I'm happy just to support you from the shadows...!

Let me change the question. I hear you're a
self-proclaimed "executive officer." Do you run a
company or something?

No, no, not at all! I'm just a humble female
executive officer of a secret society...
...A secret society?

N-No, it's nothing dangerous! Don't worry, we don't
bother anyone...!

(The more I hear, the more suspicious it sounds...
At any rate, she's no mere trader. There may be some
secret to the junk she's selling.)

You might as well show me what you're selling.
Not that I think you have anything suspicious there.
...Wait, are you interested?
W-Well...maybe a little curious.

I see, I see! Well then, do have a look around!
Here, take a sample of our products!

Right, um, thanks... You switched right into sales
mode...

How about this Bread Clip? Based on our feedback,
about 100% of our bread-loving customers use it―
I don't think I need it.

Then, how about this "S-hook"?! Look at its
beautiful curve! Just feel it in your hands!
(...Now then, what to do.)

(This situation is honestly annoying. But if I leave
now, I won't be able to investigate...)

Um... As a big fan, I love how you're cool as a
cucumber, but some sort of reaction would be nice...
W-Wait, are you not going to buy anything...?!

*sob* At this rate, I'll be in the red again this
month... *sniffle*

N-Now you're trying to guilt me into buying
something...

You see, I have four others to look after... There's
our leader, a scientist, a bodyguard, and a
cleaner...

(She's desperate... And a secret society with just
five members?)

(At least now I know that this secret society isn't
the Cult. Now I'll just keep an eye on her from
afar...)

I trust them, and they trust me... All four are my
precious teammates.
(...Did her mood just change?)

Supporting my teammates as their executive
officer... That's my job...
...Even if it's just you who thinks that?

It doesn't matter. I am who I am because of my
teammates.
(Teammates who make her who she is, huh...)

(I see. I thought she was some kind of weirdo, but
turns out she might actually be pretty earnest and
sincere.)
...So, I'm just doing this on a whim, but...
Oh?

That "plastic divider"...did you say? Can I buy it?
I'm starting to think I could use one.
Wh-Wh-Wha... R-Really?!

Really. Come on, sell it to me before I change my
mind.

One "plastic divider" SOLD! Will you be paying with
cash?

What else is there...? Of course, cash. How much is
it anyway? I guess 50 zeni should cover it.
That'll be 100,000 zeni flat!
...What did you just say?
That'll be 100,000 zeni flat!
No way, that's way too expensive!

It might seem pricey, but it balances out when you
divide cost with performance. You know,
'cause it's a "divider." Get it?!
Don't try to disarm me with a pun!

(This girl, she may be earnest, but...she's still a
weird one.)
So, will you buy it?

I think I'll pass. I was just probing around because
you seemed a little shady, and 100,000 zeni is
beyond my budget.

Sorry for suspecting you... Here, let me shake your
hand as a way of apology.

N-No... It feels wrong to shake the hands of my
idol...
You're still going on about that, huh...

Zeta, unable to grasp much about Lui, later reports
to Alpha that there were no particular issues...
